Hello all,

We are glad to announce that new powerful VPS tariffs implemented.
vCPU speed is till to 4.9GHz, port speed till to 800 Mbit. Traffic is unmetered on "fair play" terms.
You can find new tariffs on this page https://www.robovps.biz/en/power_vps/
Feel free contact us if you will need any assistance with using new tariffs.
